module.name: btmailchimpecommerce
module.description: Synchronize your products and customer base with Mailchimp to build a quality automated customer relationship while enjoying a maximum deliverability for your newsletters
module.author: Business Tech
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to remove it ? Your Mailchimp Pro module will no longer work. Be careful, all your configuration and your data will be lost locally but not in Mailchimp.
